[{"id":369,"title":"Raffolux player Karen makes headlines","slug":"raffolux-player-karen-makes-headlines","updated_on":"2023-04-26T12:29:51.829Z","content":"Karen Hewit, a devoted mother from the UK, has been making headlines recently for her first holiday in 30 years. Karen has dedicated her entire life to caring for her son Jack, who has cerebral palsy and severe epilepsy. Her story of love and sacrifice has touched the hearts of people around the world, and it's been revealed that she's a long-term player of Raffolux.com, the online raffle site where she won her holiday.





Karen's son, Jack, was diagnosed with cerebral palsy at birth, which affects movement and coordination, causing significant physical and developmental disabilities. In addition, Jack also has severe epilepsy, requiring around-the-clock care and attention. Karen has been his primary caregiver for the past 30 years, providing constant support and assistance.


Raffolux.com, the online raffle site, offers luxury prizes to raise money for charities, and Karen is a long-term player. Her participation in the site led her to win a week-long stay in a caravan park in Cornwall, a well-deserved break for her after three decades of caregiving.


The trip was a life-changing experience for Karen, who could finally take a break from her caregiving duties and enjoy some time for herself. She could unwind and create beautiful memories, something that she has not had the chance to do for a long time.


Karen's story is a beautiful reminder of the importance of taking care of our loved ones, and the incredible sacrifices parents make for their children. Her dedication and selflessness serve as an inspiration to us all, and her well-deserved holiday is a testimony to the power of kindness and generosity.


We are so happy that our lovely Karen enjoyed her trip away! Karen has appeared in many local papers such as Wales Online, Belfast Liveand over 16 other incredible titles. Don’t miss out… join the fun!





 ","created_on":"2023-04-26T11:27:32.702Z","status":1,"author":"Raffolux","img_alt":"Mum going on her first holiday in 30 years after dedicating life to looking after son","img_url":"media/winners/KARENHDEVON.webp","keywords":"x","news_category":"ALL","card_description":"Mum going on her first holiday in 30 years after dedicating","meta_description":"Mum going on her first holiday in 30 years after dedicating life to looking after son","meta_title":"Raffolux player Karen makes headlines"},{"id":368,"title":"Using Raffles to Raise Money for Charity","slug":"using-raffle-raise-money-charity","updated_on":"2023-04-04T15:48:29.228Z","content":"Raffles are a popular way to raise funds for charitable causes, and for good reason. They offer a fun and engaging way for people to contribute to a good cause while also having the chance to win a prize. Here are some of the benefits of using raffles to support charitable causes:


Raffles can raise significant funds : Raffles can be a highly effective way to raise funds for charities. By selling raffle tickets, charities can generate significant revenue that can be used to support their programs and initiatives.


 Raffles help raise awareness : Raffles can be a great way to raise awareness about a particular cause or charity. By promoting the raffle through social media, email newsletters, and other channels, charities can reach a wider audience and educate them about the work they do.


 Raffles engage supporters : Raffles can be a fun and engaging way to involve supporters in fundraising efforts. By offering attractive prizes and promoting the raffle through various channels, charities can encourage people to get involved and contribute to the cause.


 Raffles build community : Raffles can help build a sense of community around a particular cause or charity. By bringing people together and encouraging them to support the same cause, charities can create a sense of shared purpose and inspire people to work together to achieve a common goal.

With up to £100,000 of prizes up for grabs, this is an opportunity you don't want to miss.


All you have to do is purchase a ticket and once the number is revealed you will find out if you have won a prize INSTANTLY. The prizes include exclusive experiences, luxury items, and more!

This instant win Treasure hunt is packed full of HUGE cash prizes!


CASH IS KING


4x £5,000
1x £3,000
3x £2,000
30x £1,000
AND THAT'S JUST THE BIG CASH...there are up to 880 instant wins you could win in total!


This instant win is also stuffed full of tech, holidays, vouchers, and credit. You name it it's probably in here.


Simply enter the raffle and you will be randomly allocated your tickets. If your tickets match one of the numbers in the details below, you will win that prize instantly!


Every ticket will also be in with an equal chance of winning the grand prize of £10,000 cash!
